summary:
A thought occurred to me last night as I had a brief conversation with Veronique on Bluesky last night.  She posted a quick thought about a TV show, Archive 81:
 

twenty min into watching archive 81 and iâ€™m properly hooked
December 11, 2024 at 8:00 PM


My first thought was to reply and ask about the show - which I did - and we had a quick back-and-forth about it where she explained the brief premise.  I said that sounded interesting, and then when I looked into it further I discovered it was a podcast - we both found that interesting...
title: Conversations
